rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Nopon love Samod a bit too much,
if you ask me. It's like Juicy Samod
is all anyone eats around here!

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I mean, it's not bad, but you start
to get sick of it after a while.

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0003
rows.name:
The good news is, though, I know
a way to solve this problem!

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0005
rows.name:
The more the city thrives, the more
it'll start trading with other cities.

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0006
rows.name:
And that means more options for us
customers to buy in the shops!

rows.label: tlk41400011_03_msg0007
rows.name:
Though of course, you can't have trade
without securing trade routes. We might
need mercenary help on that front...
